title: Flipped Learning-Based Elementary English Vocabulary Acquisition and Motivation Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English vocabulary and grammar comprehension
context.additional_context: Course combining flipped learning and PBL in a limited technological environment focused on smartphones to improve English vocabulary acquisition and learning motivation

learning_goals: Learners can apply 50 basic English vocabulary words contextually within one week.
Learners enhance creative vocabulary application skills through group projects.
Over 80% of learners respond positively in learning motivation surveys.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
